Authors:  Paige M. Harrison and Allen J. Beck
Table 10. Number of sentenced prisoners under State or Federal jurisdiction, by age, 1995 and 2003

Note:  State inmate estimates by age for 1995 were based on the Survey of Inmates in State Correctional Facilities, 1997, and for 2003 on the National Corrections Reporting Program, 2002. These estimates were then adjusted to the sentenced inmate count in each year in the NPS-1.
Federal inmate counts by age were based on the BJS Federal justice statistics database and then adjusted to NPS-1 counts in each year. All estimates were rounded to the nearest 100.
